channel.title: How do i create a bat file or get one?

item.title: How do i create a bat file or get one?
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

God…Go to desktop, Right click an a little rectanglar tab will appear then look for the word “New” with a arrow next to it, hover over it until a new tab opens then left click on “text document”.

Then do what i said before.

item.source: How do i create a bat file or get one?

item.title: How do i create a bat file or get one?
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

  1. Create new text doc.
  2. Name the doc whatever the hell you want but as long as you save it as a .bat rather then a .txt Eg. File.bat
  3. Press enter & BAM there is a bat file.

If you really want to have some fun do this:

  1. Right click on the new bat file
  2. Type shutdown -s
  3. Save & run.
  4. Good fun ;).

Read full topic
